channel.title: When i attack an npc it just hits 0s?
channel.description:
how comes when i attack an npc with melee it wont hit at all? it will just hit 0s
range and mage hit. but melee and unarmed dont hit just hits 0s
and i have all the weapon animations correct, n ospecials.. i dont know.. any help?
thanks alot rep++ for a week if someone helps me
